name: ATF - Ho2De Mode
description:
ATF - Ho2De Mode is a Fan Art Project game, based on the VR game "After the Fall" by Vertigo Games.

I tried to take almost all of the Original game elements of the 3D/VR version, and put it into a 2D Pixel Art Shooter.

Therefore, all similarities to the game of Vertigo Games belongs to Vertigo Games, like Sounds, Music, Pictures or Character styles etc.

Iam usually a graphic designer from Switzerland and never done a game before. I also never done Pixel Art before this game, so, don´t judge me to hard :D

This is not just for "After the Fall" Fans. This is for everybody who wants to try, to survive Wave 10!

Have fun!

TheRocket79
